{"id":550788105,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1630992157,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/550788105/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Two Sum IV - Input is a BST","memory":"N/A","code":"/**\n * Definition for a binary tree node.\n * struct TreeNode {\n *     int val;\n *     TreeNode *left;\n *     TreeNode *right;\n *     TreeNode() : val(0), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}\n *     TreeNode(int x) : val(x), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}\n *     TreeNode(int x, TreeNode *left, TreeNode *right) : val(x), left(left), right(right) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    bool b=false;\n    vector<int>ar;\n    void calc(TreeNode *root,int k)\n    {\n        if (root==nullptr)\n            return;\n        calc(root->left,k);\n        if(root->val<k&&root!=nullptr)\n        ar.push_back(root->val);\n        calc(root->right,k);\n        \n    }\n    void sum_calc(int k)\n    {\n        int sum=0;int i=0;\n       while(i<ar.size())\n        {\n           for(int j=i;j<ar.size();j++)\n           {\n               if(ar[i]+ar[j]==k)\n               {\n                   b=true;\n                   break;\n               }\n           }\n           i++;\n           if(b==true)\n               break;\n        }\n        \n    }\n    bool findTarget(TreeNode* root, int k) {\n        calc(root,k);\n        sum_calc(k);\n        return b;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"two-sum-iv-input-is-a-bst"}
